LanguageData.VEF_RangedCooldownFactor.label: ranged cooldown factor
LanguageData.VEF_RangedCooldownFactor.description: The cooldown on ranged weapons of the wearer is multiplied by this value.
LanguageData.VEF_VerbRangeFactor.label: verb range factor
LanguageData.VEF_VerbRangeFactor.description: The range on weapons is multiplied by this value.
LanguageData.VEF_VerbCooldownFactor.label: verb cooldown factor
LanguageData.VEF_VerbCooldownFactor.description: The cooldown on weapons is multiplied by this value.
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldEnergyMaxOffset.label: Shield max energy offset
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldEnergyMaxOffset.descript: Offset of the maximum shield energy that the user can boost through various means.
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldEnergyMaxFactor.label: Shield max energy factor
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldEnergyMaxFactor.descript: Factor of the maximum shield energy that the user can boost through various means.
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldEnergyMaxApparel.label: shield max energy
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldEnergyMaxApparel.descrip: The maximum energy a shield generator can have at one time. More energy absorbs more damage.
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldRechargeRateApparel.desc: The rate at which a shield gains energy as long as it is not broken.
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldRadiusApparel.label: shield radius
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldRadiusApparel.descriptio: The area covered when the energy shield is active.
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldEnergyMaxPawn.label: shield max energy
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldEnergyMaxPawn.descriptio: The maximum energy a shield generator can have at one time. More energy absorbs more damage.
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldRechargeRatePawn.label: shield recharge rate
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldRechargeRatePawn.descrip: The rate at which a shield gains energy as long as it is not broken.
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldRadiusPawn.label: shield radius
LanguageData.VEF_EnergyShieldRadiusPawn.description: The area covered when the energy shield is active.
LanguageData.VEF_MeleeAttackSpeedFactor.label: melee attack speed factor
LanguageData.VEF_MeleeAttackSpeedFactor.description: A multiplier on melee attack speed.
LanguageData.VEF_RangeAttackSpeedFactor.label: range attack speed factor
LanguageData.VEF_RangeAttackSpeedFactor.description: A multiplier on range attack speed.
LanguageData.VEF_MeleeAttackDamageFactor.label: melee attack damage factor
LanguageData.VEF_MeleeAttackDamageFactor.description: A multiplier on melee attack damage.
LanguageData.VEF_RangeAttackDamageFactor.label: range attack damage factor
LanguageData.VEF_RangeAttackDamageFactor.description: A multiplier on range attack damage.
LanguageData.VEF_FoodCapacityMultiplier.label: body food capacity multiplier
LanguageData.VEF_FoodCapacityMultiplier.description: Increases the size of the pawn's hunger bar. This does not affect hunger
LanguageData.VEF_BodySize_Offset.label: body size offset
LanguageData.VEF_BodySize_Offset.description: Increases the size of the pawn relative to their current size
LanguageData.VEF_BodySize_Multiplier.label: body size multiplier
LanguageData.VEF_BodySize_Multiplier.description: Increases the size of the pawn by a multiple of their current size
LanguageData.VEF_CosmeticBodySize_Offset.label: cosmetic body size offset
LanguageData.VEF_CosmeticBodySize_Offset.description: Increases the size of the pawn relative to their current size
LanguageData.VEF_CosmeticBodySize_Multiplier.label: cosmetic body size multiplier
LanguageData.VEF_CosmeticBodySize_Multiplier.descript: Increases the size of the pawn by a multiple of their current size
LanguageData.VEF_HeadSize_Cosmetic.label: head size multiplier
LanguageData.VEF_PawnRenderPosOffset.label: pawn render offset
LanguageData.VEF_PawnRenderPosOffset.description: Modifies the pawn's rendered position in y-axis.
